data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 28,657 believers in Gracias a Dios and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gracias a Dios, Honduras
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Gracias a Dios, Honduras. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Gracias a Dios, Honduras that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 28,657 believers in Gracias a Dios, Honduras to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Lord, the believers in the state of Gracias a Dios, Honduras need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Gracias a Dios, Honduras that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, grace the churches in Gracias a Dios, Honduras with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

location.name: Gracias a Dios
location.cities_list: Puerto Lempira, Brus Laguna, Barra Patuca, Iralaya, Auas
location.cities_list_w_pop: Puerto Lempira (4,856), Brus Laguna (4,067), Barra Patuca (2,758), Iralaya (1,520), Auas (1,505)
